FIX-M2-ORCHESTRATION.title: Fix M2 Sync and Gov Reset
FIX-M2-ORCHESTRATION.instruction:
Implement recommendations from Money_Leak_Resolution.md: 1. Update Phase3_Transaction to process secondary transactions (loans). 2. Call government.reset_tick_flow() in Phase0. 3. Ensure all money creation is tracked by Authorized Delta.

FIX-TEST-REMAINDER.title: Fix Last 6 Test Failures
FIX-TEST-REMAINDER.instruction:
Fix the remaining 6 test failures in logs/final_merged_test_results.log. Focus on Category C and E leftovers like indicator_aggregation and OMO system tests.
